backend/main.mo: Main backend actor managing user profiles with Pro subscription status, integrating blob storage, Stripe payments, HTTP outcalls, and access control; includes migration support and functions to grant/verify Pro subscriptions after payment.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms old user profiles with 'hasProSubscription' field to new profiles with 'isPro' field, preserving all other profile data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two features: automatic free Pro access for owners in the frontend UI, and '$20 to upgrade' messaging for non-owner accounts in ProFeaturesModal.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of frontend files including components, hooks, and configuration files covering chat, media generation, translation, math solving, games, and Pro upgrade functionality.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables for backgrounds, foregrounds, borders, and component colors.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point with comprehensive SEO meta tags, Open Graph tags, Twitter Card tags, PWA manifest link, and JSON-LD structured data for Nexora AI platform.
frontend/public/demo.html: Standalone interactive demo page with dark theme styling using OKLCH colors, tabbed navigation, and card-based layout for showcasing Neroxa AI features.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining Neroxa AI app metadata, icons, display mode, theme colors, and orientation for progressive web app installation.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt file allowing all user agents to crawl all pages of the site.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: XML sitemap listing all main application routes (home, chat, math, media, translation, music, art, code, games) with priorities and update frequencies for SEO.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application entry point that sets up React Query, TanStack Router with all route definitions (chat, math, media, translator, music, art, code, games, payments, etc.), and wraps the app with ThemeProvider, InternetIdentityProvider, and QueryClientProvider.
frontend/src/components/ArtCanvas.tsx: Interactive drawing canvas component with color palette, brush size controls, eraser tool, and AI art idea generator chat. Supports saving artwork locally and sharing via backend with shareable URLs.
frontend/src/components/ChatPage.tsx: Main chat page layout that combines ChatSidebar and ChatView components, manages session selection via URL params, and provides navigation controls with a close button.
frontend/src/components/ChatSidebar.tsx: Collapsible sidebar displaying chat session history with timestamps, new chat button, and session selection. Shows loading states and formats relative timestamps for each conversation.
frontend/src/components/ChatView.tsx: Chat interface displaying messages between user and AI assistant with typing indicators, auto-scrolling, and message input. Generates contextual AI responses with simulated typing delays.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary component that catches and displays errors with a user-friendly UI, showing error details and providing reset/reload options.
frontend/src/components/GameBrowser.tsx: Displays a searchable, filterable grid of games with tabs for all/user/AI-created games. Supports game deletion for owners and launches GamePlayer when a game is selected.
frontend/src/components/GameCard.tsx: Renders an individual game card with thumbnail, title, description, creator badge (AI/User), and a play button. Includes hover effects and click handlers.
frontend/src/components/GameModeModal.ts: Modal dialog presenting three options: play built-in games, browse community games, or create a new game. Routes user to appropriate view based on selection.
frontend/src/components/GamePlayer.tsx: Embeds and plays games in an iframe, supporting both predefined templates (Flappy Bird, Snake, Pong, etc.) and user-created games. Tracks scores via postMessage and updates high scores on the backend.
frontend/src/components/GameStudio.tsx: Form-based editor for creating games with title, description, and HTML/CSS/JavaScript code fields. Saves games to backend and navigates to browser on success.
frontend/src/components/GamesView.tsx: Main games container managing view state (menu/predefined/browse/create/playing) with navigation between modes. Renders appropriate child component based on current view and handles game selection.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Application header component with logo, theme toggle, authentication status, Pro badge display, and navigation buttons (home, sign out). Shows user profile info and conditional Pro upgrade button for non-Pro/non-owner users.
frontend/src/components/HomePage.tsx: Main landing page displaying a grid of navigation cards for different AI features (Math Solver, Chat, Translator, Code, Music, Art, Media, Games). Includes admin payment setup section and a Pro upgrade modal button (hidden for owners).
frontend/src/components/MathProblemSolve: Math problem solver with difficulty levels (K-2 through 11-12), teacher mode for concept explanations, and homework helper mode with chat-style Q&A. Evaluates expressions client-side and generates step-by-step solutions.
frontend/src/components/MediaDisplay.tsx: Media search interface with tabs for images and videos, featuring auto-search with debouncing, image download functionality, and video preview dialog. Uses external web search APIs without requiring user API keys.
frontend/src/components/MusicGenerator.t: Music generation component with AI-powered audio creation from text prompts and a beat pattern sequencer for kick/snare/hihat. Includes playback controls, tempo adjustment, sharing functionality, and downloadable audio output.
frontend/src/components/PaymentFailure.t: Payment cancellation/failure page displaying error state with explanation of what happened and action buttons to return home or retry the Pro upgrade purchase.
frontend/src/components/PaymentSetup.tsx: Admin component for configuring Stripe payment integration with secret key input, allowed countries configuration, and status display showing whether Stripe is configured.
frontend/src/components/PaymentSuccess.t: Success page displayed after completing Stripe payment, showing Pro subscription benefits and navigation buttons to home or Pro features.
frontend/src/components/PredefinedGameSe: Modal dialog displaying a grid of predefined games (Flappy Bird, Snake, Pong, etc.) with Pro-only games locked behind subscription, allowing users to select and launch games.
frontend/src/components/ProFeaturesModal: Modal showcasing Pro subscription features with a $20 USD price, checkout button that creates a Stripe session, and displays Pro status for existing subscribers.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Modal dialog for first-time users to enter their name and create a user profile, with non-dismissible behavior until completed.
frontend/src/components/ProUpgrade.tsx: Full-page Pro upgrade component listing eight premium features (enhanced AI, 3D games, art generation, etc.) with pricing and checkout integration via Stripe.
frontend/src/components/Scripter.tsx: React component that provides a chat-based interface for generating code snippets from natural language descriptions, with features for copying code to clipboard and message history display.
frontend/src/components/SharedContentVie: Component that displays shared artwork or music content by ID, handling loading states, errors, and rendering appropriate media players or image viewers.
frontend/src/components/TranslatorChat.t: Translation interface component with language selection dropdowns, text input area, and translation history display supporting 12 languages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that manages Internet Computer actor creation with authentication, handling both anonymous and authenticated actors with automatic query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useArtIdeaGenerator.t: Hook that generates creative art prompt suggestions based on user input keywords, providing randomized ideas across categories like animals, landscapes, fantasy, and abstract art.
frontend/src/hooks/useArtworkShare.ts: Hook for sharing artwork with mutation handling and URL generation, though backend artwork sharing support has been removed.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioGeneration.ts: Hook that generates synthetic audio using Web Audio API, creating simple melodies based on text prompts and converting them to WAV format blobs.
frontend/src/hooks/useCanvasDrawing.ts: Custom React hook that manages canvas drawing state and operations including mouse/touch drawing, erasing, color/brush size control, and canvas clearing with white background initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useChatSessions.ts: Manages chat sessions stored in localStorage with React Query, providing CRUD operations for sessions and messages, plus an AI response generator that handles greetings, math, science, and history questions with contextual responses.
frontend/src/hooks/useCheckout.ts: React Query mutation hook that creates Stripe checkout sessions via the backend actor, accepting shopping items and generating success/cancel URLs for payment flow.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameCatalogue.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching game catalogue data, individual game metadata, categories, and games by category from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGames.ts: React Query hooks for CRUD operations on games (get all, get single, create, delete) via the backend actor with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameState.ts: Manages game high scores using localStorage with React Query, providing hooks to retrieve and update high scores per game ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useImageSearch.ts: Implements free image search using Unsplash Source API without requiring an API key, fetching 12 unique images per search query using different random seeds.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaGeneration.ts: Hook for generating images and videos from text prompts with detailed prompt analysis (colors, shapes, subjects, actions, settings, emotions, styles) and animation detection capabilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useMusicShare.ts: Hook for sharing music that generates a local music ID and provides URL copying functionality, though backend music sharing is no longer supported.
frontend/src/hooks/useScriptGeneration.t: Hook that manages AI script generation with mock responses for React, Python, JavaScript, API, and calculator code based on user requests.
frontend/src/hooks/useSharedContent.ts: Hooks for querying shared artwork and music content that throw errors since backend sharing is no longer supported.
frontend/src/hooks/useTranslation.ts: Hook providing mock translation functionality with hardcoded translations for common greetings and thanks phrases across multiple languages.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Hooks for fetching and saving user profiles with admin/owner status checking, ensuring admin users have isPro status.
frontend/src/hooks/useVideoSearch.ts: Hook providing mock video search functionality with a curated database of sample videos organized by categories like nature, animals, technology, and sports.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom gold-themed color variables for light and dark modes, including sidebar styling and background image setup.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function combining clsx and tailwind-merge for conditional CSS class name merging.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
HTML template string containing a complete Breakout game implementation with canvas rendering, brick collision, paddle controls, and scoring system.
frontend/src/templates/flappyBirdTemplat: Exports a complete HTML template for a Flappy Bird game with bird sprite, pipe obstacles, gravity physics, score tracking, and tap-to-flap controls.
Exports a complete HTML template for a Fortnite-style shooter game with enemies, teammates, weapons shop, health/level system, and shooting mechanics.
frontend/src/templates/minecraftTemplate: Exports a complete HTML template for a Minecraft-style block mining game with a grid-based world, different block types (grass, dirt, stone, wood, diamond), player movement, and resource collection.
frontend/src/templates/pongTemplate.ts: Exports a complete HTML template for a Pong game with player paddle, AI opponent, ball physics, collision detection, and score tracking to 10 points.
frontend/src/templates/robloxTemplate.ts: Exports a complete HTML template for a Roblox-style platformer with player character, platforms, coin collection, jumping mechanics, and gravity physics.
frontend/src/templates/snakeTemplate.ts: Exports a complete HTML template string for a Snake game with canvas rendering, keyboard/touch controls, scoring system, and game-over screen with restart functionality.
frontend/src/utils/errorLogger.ts: Implements an ErrorLogger class that logs errors with severity levels (info, warning, error, critical), maintains a circular buffer of recent logs, and outputs to console with appropriate methods.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for extracting and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support for maintaining state across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended theme settings for sidebar/chart colors, custom border radius variables, font families, shadows, and animation keyframes.
project_state.json: Project state file for Nexora AI app tracking Pro feature implementation where the owner gets free Pro access and other users pay $20, with pending feature requests for Pro badge UI and payment system.
